Item.text: _user_ and Jordan Welcome back .
_user_ and Cristina, hello. What are we learning about today?

_user_ and Jordan, today we will be clarifying pronouns. This means we will be clearing up confusion about pronouns. A pronoun is a word used instead of a noun such as he, it, and their to name a few. # He went to the store. Jane needs to fix it. Their backyard is huge. Pronouns are important text signals. These are all examples of pronouns and how they can be used.
_user_, Cristina, I think that I may need help to clarify pronouns.
Jordan, don't worry. It will be fun and I am sure we can both help you.

I think I get it. So, in this example the underlined pronoun is her. We need to clarify who or what the pronoun, her, is referring to. by replacing it with the correct highlighted noun.
Exactly. it will be helpful to read the paragraphs first so that you know what is going on. This will help to give you context for clarifying the pronouns.

Question.text: _user_, Here is a sentence. Kim sees, her, every month for checkups. Click on the noun that best replaces the pronoun, her.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The noun that replaces the word, her, is a doctor. The previous sentence gives us context for clarifying the pronoun. The word, her, must refer to something feminine. Therefore, it cannot be Ben.

Answer.text: The noun that replaces the word, her, is a doctor. The previous sentence gives us context for clarifying the pronoun. The word, her, must refer to something feminine

Answer.name: CristinaExplanation
Answer.text: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch is at least the size of Texas. If we look at the previous sentence we see that the Great Pacific Garbage Patch was what was discovered. # Hawaii and California simply give us details about its location. The size of these states is not important to the context of this sentence, and does not clarify the pronoun, it. # If we use the replace and check strategy, we can see that the Great Pacific Garbage Patch is the best choice.

Question.text: _user_, which noun best replaces the pronoun, they, in this sentence? They understand the challenges garbage poses.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The experts understand the challenges garbage poses. As we have seen throughout the activity today, the previous sentence can sometimes be used to create context for clarifying the pronoun. # In this case the subject from the first sentence in this paragraph, the experts, is the best answer. Animals are troubled by the existence of trash, but they do not possess the ability to form an opinion on the issue. # And while the searchers most certainly understand the issues that garbage poses, the experts are much better qualified to know how garbage effects both marine life and the search for the missing plane.

Answer.text: Please click on one of the answer choices. Remember that if you scroll over the noun choices, you can replace and check for the best answer.

Answer.text: You are doing a pretty great job. I am getting this down.

Answer.name: CristinaExplanation
Answer.text: The experts understand the challenges garbage poses. As we have seen throughout the activity today, the previous sentence can sometimes be used to create context for clarifying the pronoun. # In this case the subject from the first sentence in this paragraph, the experts, is the best answer. Animals are troubled by the existence of trash, but they do not possess the ability to form an opinion on the issue. # And while the searchers most certainly understand the issues that garbage poses, the experts are much better qualified to know how garbage effects both marine life and the search for the missing plane.

Rule.name: Start
Rule.description: The lesson starts from this rule. It loads a page defined in the rigid pack Opening_1, delivers opening speeches and moves to the rule LoadPage.

Rule.name: Start2
Rule.description: Finished medium and changes to easy or hard.

Rule.name: UserMoveOn1
Rule.description: Unused rule.

Rule.name: UserMoveOn2
Rule.description: Unused rule.

Rule.name: SystemMoveOn
Rule.description: Unused rule.

Rule.name: LoadPage2
Rule.description: The first page of the easy of hard loaded. Directs to GetDifficulty rule to find out the difficulty level.

Rule.name: LoadPage
Rule.description: At the status LoadPage, if a MediaLoaded event is received, the rule will be directed to the rule GetDifficulty

Rule.name: GetDifficulty
Rule.description: This rule is to check the difficulty level of the current page and direct to a rule that gets corresponding tutoring pack. To GetTutoringPack (3)

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackEasy
Rule.description: This rule checks if an Easy tutoring pack exists.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackMedium
Rule.description: This rule chesk if a Medium tutoring pack exists.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackHard
Rule.description: This rule checks if a hard tutoring pack exists.

Rule.name: Continue
Rule.description: When the desired tutoring pack exists, the rule continues with an item on the media page. To GetItem (2)

Rule.name: Stop
Rule.description: When all tutoring pack are used, goes to Close status.

Rule.name: Close
Rule.description: Delivers closing rigid pack and end the conversation.

Rule.name: End
Rule.description: The end of the lesson.

Rule.name: HasItem
Rule.description: When there is a next item on the media page, activate the next item and direct to the rule MediaShown.

Rule.name: MediaShown
Rule.description: After the media item is shown up, check which agent is supposed to ask the question and direct to the rule JordanAskQ or ChristinaAskQ.

Rule.name: NoItem
Rule.description: When all items on the media are done, direct to the rule Start2.

Rule.name: JordanAskQ
Rule.description: Jordan asks main question. This assumes that every tutoring pack has a main question prepared for Jordan. The rule will trigger waiting event and then direct to UserAnswer rules.

Rule.name: CristinaAskQ
Rule.description: Christina asks main question. This assumes every tutoring pack has a main question prepared for Christina. The rue will trigger a waiting event and then direct to UserAnswer rules.

Rule.name: Correct
Rule.description: When the user's answer is correct, check which agent asked the question and direct to the the corresponding QAsked rule.

Rule.name: JordanAsked
Rule.description: This rule is for correct answer and questoin was asked by Jordan. Next will be GoBack rule.

Rule.name: ChristinaAskedJC
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: ChristinaAskedJI
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: Incorrect
Rule.description: When the user's answer is correct, check which agent asked the question and direct to the the corresponding QAsked rule.

Rule.name: JordanAskedInc
Rule.description: This rule is for correct answer and questoin was asked by Jordan. Next will be GoBack rule.

Rule.name: ChristinaAskedIncJI
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: ChristinaAskedIncJC
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: Blank
Rule.description: This is the rule for first time out. The rule is directed to the second round answer.

Rule.name: Correct2
Rule.description: This rule is for correct answer after Blankprompt.It checks question agent and directs to QAsked2 rules.

Rule.name: JordanAsked2
Rule.description: This is for correct second round answer and Jordan asked the question. Directs to GoBack.

Rule.name: ChristinaAsked2JC
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: ChristinaAsked2JI
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: Incorrect2
Rule.description: When the user's answer is correct, check which agent asked the question and direct to the the corresponding QAsked rule.

Rule.name: JordanAsked2Inc
Rule.description: This rule is for correct answer and questoin was asked by Jordan. Next will be GoBack rule.

Rule.name: ChristinaAsked2IncJC
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: ChristinaAsked2IncJI
Rule.description: This rule is for correct user answer and Cristina asked the qustion. The rule is directed to GoBack.

Rule.name: Blank2JC
Rule.description: Second time out. Directs to GoBack.

Rule.name: Blank2JI
Rule.description: Second time out. Directs to GoBack.

Rule.name: GoBack
Rule.description: This rule checks the difficulty level and decide what transition to use for next item, if any.

Rule.name: TransitionMedium
Rule.description: Continue with next Medium item.

Rule.name: TransitionEasy
Rule.description: Continue with next esay item.

Rule.name: TransitionHard
Rule.description: Continue with next hard item.

Rule.name: ChangeLevelEasy
Rule.description: Reached the last page of medium and chages to easy.

Rule.name: ChangeLevelHard
Rule.description: Reached the last page of medium and changes to hard.
